So this project will also look at ways to alleviate that. Sergio Marchionne , CEO of Chrysler Group, stated that the overall goal of the project is to evaluate and, hopefully, validate both fuel-efficiency gains and greenhouse gas reductions from using a light-duty hydraulic hybrid system.
